description.title: Why do we get motion sick?
description.body: In 3D games, fast camera spins or screen shake make the brain sense a mismatch between vision and balance. As that mismatch stacks up, you lose orientation and feel dizzy or tired. To fix it, you need visual aids that keep a stable reference point even in shaky scenes.

item1.title: Centralized HUD anchor
item1.body: A steady reference at the center of the screen helps you keep direction during sharp turns or rolls.

item2.title: Layout tuning
item2.body: Adjust size, color, and opacity to get the layout that fits you best.
